Menu

UX Designer and Product Team Lead at Booking.com
Based in Amsterdam, NL.

I suspect that you are here either becuase you have a good reason to have a collaborative conversation with me. Maybe we met on a train. Maybe you came across me on the digital plane. You see, I currently work in travel and our dream is to help people experience the world... and that's what I was doing!

So, I am a creative computer geek from California. I love to build things and help people solve complex problems. I thrive as a team leader. I am currently working for the travel enabler, Booking.com. Here I have worked as the technical lead and UX designer on teams in the marketing department that have developed new products to reward travelers with credits and find and use rewards. On these teams we would start with a pretty big hypothesis, orchestrate a boot camp or design sprint, talk to relevant stakeholders and start prototyping, user testing, and experimenting with a business that connects over xxx,xxx hotels and travelers a night. I have also spent time on teams focused on customer journey optimization with a focus on users coming from PPC, SEO, and Meta traffic. I am the team lead for this team as well.

I believe that everything else that you need to know can be learned. This website is a place for me to share solutions to real world problems in an effort to collectively progress our understanding of our shared interests, where technology and our lives collide.

CASE STUDIES AND ARTICLES:

Design a mobile micro-interaction with Principle

Featured on Medium as a staff writer for Prototyping: From UX to Front End

Principle is a design tool used for animating user interfaces. Prototyping an interactive user interface with Principle allows you to quickly evaluate your ideas before investing engineering time, speeding up the design and development cycle.

Creating a static website engine with Jekyll

Jekyll was created as a 'blog platform for hackers' at Github to enable developers to generate static HTML websites, without relying on a database. I will walk you through a simple and structured workflow to get you up and running in no time.

UX audit of sign up and onboarding process for Volusion.com

Volusion is an ecommerce platform with over 40,000 online shops. We were asked to analyze the competition and re-imagine what we could do between sign up and a user’s initial introduction to the Volusion dashboard to help boost conversions.

My name is Jarryd Wafer and I live in Amsterdam, NL where I currently work as a Product and UX designer for Booking.com where I manage a team of software developers for an agile product team in Boooking's Marketing department.

I am currently interested in new projects and interested in full-time work opportunities, speaking engagements, and teaching opportunities.

Have something that you would like to talk about? Get in touch. Maybe we will get to build something great together!
